testcase.name: Scenario: Add/create a new customer's data
Given URL is "http://localhost:8080/CustomerData/rest/xml/"
Given the client has to add a new customer with name "David", address "2 random st." and phone "226611000"

| David | 2 random st. | 226611000 |
Given URL is "http://localhost:8080/CustomerData/rest/xml/"
Given the client has to add a new customer with name "Peter", address "Queen St." and phone "220001166"

| Peter | Queen St. | 220001166 |
Given URL is "http://localhost:8080/CustomerData/rest/xml/"
Given the client has to add a new customer with name "Gary", address "Hobsan St." and phone "661062217"
When the client sends the POST request
Then the client should obtain the following XML message
| Gary | Hobsan St. | 661062217 |
